name: Broken BB+ LevelGeneration
description:
Levelgeneation is broken and look what have you done Imao...

This one didn't take as much time as the LevelGeneration mod yet still fun to play. Hope you have fun with it

Warnings...
  • You must use this on 0.3.7 and not any other versions.
  • This this works for hide and seek, endless mode and challenges
Summary...

Thanks for reading and don't forget FUN!

Note: Broken BB+ LevelGeneration made by Chris Video Greek, he forced me to upload this on Itch but whatever
